thread.title: Donald Trump’s Immigration Action in Court’s Hands
thread.title_full: Donald Trump’s Immigration Action in Court’s Hands - WSJ

author: Devlin Barrett
title: Donald Trump’s Immigration Action in Court’s Hands

organizations.name: san francisco-based ninth u.s. circuit court of appeals

text:
A federal appeals court is preparing to hear oral arguments late Tuesday on whether to reinstate some, all, or none of President Donald Trump’s executive order on immigration, a crucial test in the fast-moving legal battle over White House efforts to restrict entry into the U.S.
A three-judge panel of the San Francisco-based Ninth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals is scheduled to hold an hourlong argument session at 6 p.m. EST to consider an emergency appeal by the Trump administration. The appeal challenges a broad... RELATED VIDEO As President Donald Trump’s travel ban works its way through legal limbo, federal lawyers are trying to get a U.S. appeals court to reinstate the executive order. WSJ’s Jason Bellini walks us through this “Key Moment.” Photo: AP
